name: folio
about: A minimally designed portfolio showcasing my work through a monochrome theme, emphasizing simplicity and visual consistency.

name: OXO Redesign
about: OXO Redesign is a modern take on the classic tic-tac-toe game, featuring a sleek interface and enhanced gameplay mechanics.

name: Quick Air
about: QuickAir is an AI-powered resume builder than lets users create personalized resumes through a simple chat with an intelligent assistant, making resume writing easy and accessible for everyone.
